name: Survive: The king killer
description: Survive: The king killer is a one man team with a one life only game that is an open world survival game.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64-bit Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster. Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card or higher. DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 4 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64-bit Processor: i7 4790k Intel 4.0 GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 series card or higher. DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 4 GB available space
